author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
While the left points the finger and labels the rest of the world as racist, they could not be guilty of this if they tried. That is why Secretary of State Marco Rubio had to say the quiet part out loud.

Senator Tim Kaine accused Rubio of prioritizing one race over another solely because the South African refugees have a skin color that Kaine does not approve of.

NEW: Senator Tim Kaine looks like he's about to burst a blood vessel in his face after Secretary of State Marco Rubio suggests he's being racist.

Rubio: "The United States has a right to pick and choose who they allow in."

Kaine: "Even based on the color of somebody's skin?"… pic.twitter.com/JT1sBWS2ng
— Collin Rugg (@CollinRugg)
title: "You don't like the fact they are White": Marco Rubio DESTROYS Hillary Clinton's running mate over what refugees he wants here

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Given that Bill Gates “was very close with Jeffrey Epstein,” it’s a bit bizarre how he pretends to be all in it for the world’s poorest children. But what makes it even more disingenuous is that he claims Elon Musk is literally killing children, as a result of cuts made by Doge. This is why Musk said what needed to be said.

Question: Would you have Bill Gates babysit your children? No? Didn’t think so, and neither would Musk.

Elon Musk just BODIED Bill Gates:

“Who does Bill Gates think he is to make comments about the welfare of children, given that he was very close with Jeffrey Epstein? I wouldn't want that guy to babysit my kids.” 💀

BOOM pic.twitter.com/ByUR4cxZ1R
— Libs of TikTok (@libsoftiktok)
title: Elon Musk calls out Bill Gates after his latest attack... and OF COURSE ties Gates to Jeffrey Epstein

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
In his bestselling book, Jake Tapper pretends that he and the media were innocent in covering up former Vice President Joe Biden’s cognitive decline. Today’s show breaks down why this is “criminally stupid.”

“There were doctors saying, ‘We’re seeing this.’ There were insiders and whistleblowers saying, ‘We know this to be true,’” Crowder said. “There were many people pointing out that he suddenly developed a stutter in his 70s, which [Tapper] defended.”

While Tapper would like you to believe these “realizations” are “new,” that could not be further from the truth, as the majority of people reading this not only knew, but knew he knew.
title: Watch: Here's Why Jake Tapper's Biden Book Is Criminally Stupid

author: Brodigan
description:
When I first took an active interest in politics in 2008, the first person I took an interest in was the Florida Speaker of the House. A Cuban guy, only a little older than me, whom I had seen on the internets. He was the main reason I went to the CPAC in 2009. So, as a point of personal privilege, it has been a delight to see Marco Rubio have a chance to shine in the Trump Administration.

Today's Senate hearing versus Sen. Chris Van Hollen, back from being overseas and sharing daiquiris with illegal immigrant gang members, is a prime example of why. Seriously. Go get yourself a Diet Dr. Pepper from the fridge and enjoy the next 4:12 minutes. It starts with Van Hollen saying he regrets voting for Rubio as Secretary of State. It ends with Rubio going beast mode on USAID cuts and his desire to deport even more anti-American illegals.
title: Marco Rubio went scorched Earth defending the MAGA agenda against a Democrat senator in a must-watch video

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Most people don’t wake up one day with stage 4 prostate cancer, especially when they have access to some of the best doctors in the world and more money than the majority of Americans could ever dream of. So, while Biden allegedly received “clean bills of health” during his presidency, it’s rather odd that he was only diagnosed with stage 4 cancer months after finishing his term.

And given that the left decided to hide the fact that he was a sleeping potato, it would also raise suspicions that many people hid this diagnosis from the American people for months or years. However, the ladies on “The View” seem to disagree and believe “there's no way you wouldn't have known because he would have had to have these tre
title: The shrill harpies from “The View” make insane claim Joe Biden would have NEVER hidden having cancer while president

author: Team Crowder
description:
Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson claims black people are the most generous people, which is why he discriminates in hiring. Speaking of race relations, Ryan Clark is going after Robert Griffin III for marrying a white woman. Jake Tapper is pretending like the media was innocent in covering up former Vice President Joe Biden’s cognitive issues to the tune of one bestselling book.

HILLARY AND HAKEEM

  • Birth rates are close to a historic low: See charts
title: Sources: Explaining the  "Black Fatigue"  Phenomenon & Jake Tapper's Criminally Stupid Biden Book

author: Brodigan
description:
Tim Dillon was on Joe Rogan's podcast recently, where he mentioned interviewing with CNN about whether podcasters are the "new" establishment. See, journalismers still don't understand how Trump won and the People Who Controlled Joe Biden lost, so they are blaming it on Trump sitting down with Theo Von and The Undertaker. Dillon told Rogan the whole thing was ridiculous because he talked to CNN for half an hour, so that maybe a minute of which could make air.

Portions of the full interview are finding their way to Cousin Elon's internet, and Dillion undersold just how ridiculous the interview was. Not just the interview, but the entire premise of it... that the 2024 election results are the fault of five podcasters.

NEW: CNN interviewer gets humbled after asking comedi
title: CNN reporter asks Tim Dillon if podcasters have too much political power, didn't expect him to make her look so stupid

author: Brodigan
description:
Anyone with half of a non-cognitive declining brain knew that Joe Biden was not well. Upon hearing the former president has metastatic cancer and most likely has had it for years, there are obvious questions to be asked about who was really running the People Who Controlled Joe Biden adminstration. Who was operating the autopen? Who thought they could tweet out a new Constitutional amendment? JD Vance is asking these questions, and the media (who should be asking) is melting down for him doing so.

Vance, on the way back from visiting the new Pope (who we are happy to report is still alive), was asked about the sudden revelation about Biden's condition.

We really do need to be honest about whether the former president was capable of
title: Media freaks out on JD Vance for asking Joe Biden question we're ALL asking
